title: What is the maiden name of the mother? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not really sure what you’re asking but I think perhaps you want to know what is meant by ‘Mother’s maiden name’ …..? If so, it means your mother’s last (family) name before she was married and took your father’s name (but maybe you don’t do that).

I think your query relates to the security questions that we have to fill up when we opt for NetBanking, etc. Mother's maiden name refers to your mother's name (including surname) before she was married.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Partha Pratim Deb
